text:
@realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump 

Sir, Psychic message received last night on truth of coronavirus hovering around u like deadly Cobra from your strong room like strong office 2 house, from house 2 White House rendering u helpless in its face, offered here 4 you 2 peruse & ponder over..cont'd
